tool.name: RNPxlXICFilter
tool.description: Remove MS2 spectra from treatment based on the fold change between control and treatment.
tool.command:
@QUOTE_FOO@ @EXT_FOO@ #import re
## Preprocessing mkdir control && ln -s '$control' 'control/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $control.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($control.ext)' && mkdir treatment && ln -s '$treatment' 'treatment/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $treatment.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($treatment.ext)' && mkdir out &&
## Main program call
set -o pipefail && @EXECUTABLE@ -write_ctd ./ && python3 '$__tool_directory__/fill_ctd.py' '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$args_json' '$hardcoded_json' && @EXECUTABLE@ -ini @EXECUTABLE@.ctd -control 'control/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $control.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($control.ext)' -treatment 'treatment/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $treatment.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($treatment.ext)' -out 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("mzml")}'
## Postprocessing && mv 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("mzml")}' '$out' #if "ctd_out_FLAG" in $OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS && mv '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$ctd_out' #end if

param.name: rt_tol
param.label: RT tolerance in [s] for finding max peak (whole RT range around RT middle)

param.name: mz_tol
param.label: m/z tolerance in [ppm] for finding a peak

param.name: test
param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

data.name: ctd_out
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: ctd
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "ctd_out_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

tool.help:
Remove MS2 spectra from treatment based on the fold change between control and treatment.
For more information, visit http://www.openms.de/doxygen/release/2.6.0/html/UTILS_RNPxlXICFilter.html
